General.Name: Jiangsu Guoxin Corp Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Guoxin Corp. Ltd. engages in the generation of coal-fired thermal and gas-fired power businesses in China. The company provides electricity, heat production and supply, and related power services; sells coal; and invests in development, construction, and operation of new energy project. It also offers financial trust services. The company was formerly known as Sainty Marine Corporation Ltd. and changed its name to Jiangsu Guoxin Corp. Ltd. in March 2017. Jiangsu Guoxin Corp. Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
